Keywords

The personal blog of P. Kerim Friedman 傅可恩. For his academic blogging please visit Savage Minds.

Jun 21, 2006

Abstract Art

This wonderful diagram, made in 1936 by Alfred Barr, appears in Edward Tufte’s new book, *Beautiful Evidence*. Banksean made a wonderful interactive version on his web site. Read more on Banksean’s blog. Some illustrations from the book can be found on Tufte’s web site. {art, cubism, Tufte}

Herring

I’m inclined to agree with Jonathan Freedland when he argues that the gay marriage amendment is little more than a red herring. This is backed up by evidence that the failure to actually deliver on this will only further alienate the very people it is intended to appease.
